title: CodeTyper
description: A minimalistic website to practice your typing speed while writing code. It functions by fetching a random file from github in the designed repo and language. The project includes a reactive graph, reactive wpm, settings and much more.

title: Crypto Prices
description: A symple extension that lets you easily check crypto prices. It features a 7-day price graph and search. It is available for [chromeium](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/crypto-prices/aijcmfbomlkfaclgjpphidgoijibeobj) and [firefox](https://https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/cryptoprices/).
